title: Madeleine Headboard
description:
Dream up a beautiful bedroom with our exclusive collection of headboards and beds. The Madeleine Headboard (2023) offers luxe comfort, with a grid-tufted, softly cushioned backrest that's perfect for reading, watching movies, or lounging. Constructed in USA.
  • Plush grid tufting.
  • Available in 5 durable fabrics – including stain-repellent Crypton – in dozens of colors.
  • Choice of standard (40") or tall (48") headboard height.
  • Save 15% on a DWR Sonno Mattress (sold separately) for comfortable, rejuvenating sleep.
  • You are purchasing just a headboard. Contact us at 800.944.2233 or visit a DWR Store for compatible bed frame information. Your frame may require a modification plate.
  • Also available as a complete bed.
Brand
Design Within Reach
Collection
Madeline Bed Collection
General Dimensions
  • 40" H 47" W 4" D
Product Weight
34 lbs
Assembly
Comes fully assembled
Warranty
1-year warranty

title: Coda Headboard
description:
Dream up a beautiful bedroom with our exclusive collection of headboards and beds. The Coda Headboard (2023) invites you to unwind with the rich texture and relaxed warmth of its expertly handwoven, durable paper cord, inspired by Scandinavian craftsmanship. Its neutral palette in natural materials creates a feeling of calm and connection to nature. Made in Vietnam.
  • Handwoven in a two-over-two weave, paper cord is a durable material often used in Scandinavian furniture.
  • Choice of standard (40") or tall (48") headboard height.
  • American walnut or oak solid wood and veneer.
  • Save 15% on a DWR Sonno Mattress (sold separately) for comfortable, rejuvenating sleep.
  • You are purchasing just a headboard. Contact us at 800.944.2233 or visit a DWR Store for compatible bed frame information. Your frame may require a modification plate.
  • Also available as a complete bed.

title: Charlotte Headboard
description:
Dream up a beautiful bedroom with our exclusive collection of headboards and beds. The Charlotte Headboard (2023) features finely tailored channel tufting that's softened by plush cushioning that creates a winsome scalloped edge. The result is a headboard that's sophisticated yet welcoming, and perfect for reading, watching movies, or lounging. Constructed in USA.

title: Madeleine Bed
description:
Dream up a beautiful bedroom with our exclusive collection of headboards and beds. The Madeleine Bed (2023) offers luxe comfort, with a grid-tufted, softly cushioned headboard that's perfect for reading, watching movies, or lounging, and fully upholstered sides and foot. Choose between standard (40”), tall (48”) or grand (56”) headboard heights, depending on your space, preferences, and whether you are using a boxspring. The grand height is recommended for use with a boxspring. Constructed in USA.
  • Plush grid tufting.
  • Available in 5 durable fabrics – including stain-repellent Crypton – in dozens of colors.
  • Choice of standard (40"), tall (48"), or grand (56") headboard height.
  • Solid oak or American walnut legs.
  • Save 15% on a DWR Sonno Mattress (sold separately) for comfortable, rejuvenating sleep.

title: Sumu Headboard
description:
Add character and comfort to the Sumu Bed (sold separately) with the Sumu Headboard (2024). The DWR-exclusive collection is inspired by the best of two worlds: The Japanese wood joinery technique of tsugite and carpentry techniques from Eastern Europe. Made from solid oak with expertly applied oak veneer, the headboard brings a serene, pared-back beauty to the bedroom. Made in Estonia.
  • Inspired by Japanese wood joinery and European carpentry techniques for an artfully pared-back collection.
  • Expertly applied oak veneer highlights the headboard's fine craftsmanship.
  • For use with the Sumu Bed (sold separately.)

title: Metal Bed Frame
description:
This simple metal bed frame is designed to fit and easily attach to all our DWR Collection Headboards, including Madeleine, Charlotte, Demi, Palm, and Coda. Durably designed, it’s made of powder-coated steel. The full, queen, and king sizes come with center and vertical rails for extra support.
  • Fits DWR Collection Headboards, including Madeleine, Charlotte, Demi, Palm, and Coda.
  • Durable steel construction.
  • Designed to attach easily to DWR Headboards.
